channel.title: Tried everything. Won't connect
channel.description:
Hey everyone. Basically, my server never connects. I have got the IP as 127.0.0.1 and ports as 43594 because the server is just for me to test out before I use my No-Ip. They are all changed in Gui.java and Client.java and it still won't connect. I have the cache downloaded right in the c:/ and I run the server beforehand.
Also, how do you make it so when I run the client it also runs the server at the same time. Thanks

item.title: Tried everything. Won't connect
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

[quote=“cowo8, post:8, topic:387173”]43594 is my port… if not tell me,
and how do i turn on?
i realised if i want this fixed theres no use gettin angry.[/quote]
runserver.bat in most sources. IE: Delta, wL

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“cowo8, post:6, topic:387173”]No error. It just says can’t connect. I’ve tried using my original IP, Hamachi IP and 0.0.0.0 and none of those work.
I’m using runelive you can find that on google.
I have only changed the IP’s etc. in client files client.java, gui.java.
Do i have to change any server files
already tried that, guy above[/quote]
Server sided:

client.java, server.java

item.title: Tried everything. Won't connect
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Alright, 127.0.0.1 is your internal IP.

You need to connect to your external, to get your external navigate to: http://whatsmyip.org/

Read full topic
